prompt: Create a vibrant login form interface with a gradient background transitioning from deep purple (Colors.purple[800]) to indigo (Colors.indigo[600]). The UI should feature a centered single-column layout. Display a 'Welcome' heading at the top in a bold, 34px font with white color (Colors.white). Below, include a subtitle 'Sign in to continue' in a 15px font with a light purple color (Colors.purple[100]). Add two input fields: an email TextField with a rounded border (BorderRadius.circular(8)), a white border, an email icon prefix (Icons.email), a 'Email' label, and a hint text 'Your email'. The password TextField should have matching styling with a lock icon prefix (Icons.lock), a 'Password' label, a hint text 'Your password', and a visibility toggle. Both fields should have a purple focused border (Colors.purple[700]). Include a 'Forgot Password?' link aligned to the right in light purple (Colors.purple[100]) with a 14px font. Add a full-width elevated button for login with a purple background (Colors.purple[700]), white text, and rounded corners (BorderRadius.circular(8)). At the bottom, include a row with 'No account?' text in white followed by a 'Register' link in light purple. Use 28 pixels padding around the main content and 14 pixels spacing between elements. The form container should have a translucent white background (Colors.white.withOpacity(0.1)) and a subtle shadow (BoxShadow: color Colors.black26, blurRadius 10). Ensure the layout supports scrolling.
